head.title: Upon the death of Sir Albert Morton's Wife
head.indextitle: Upon the death of Sir Albert Morton's Wife
head.firstline: He first deceas'd: She for a little tri'd

notes.note: Kilde: The Penguin Book of Renaissance Verse 1509-1659, eds. David Norbrook & H.R. Woudhuysen, Penguin Books 1993, p. 649.

poem.body: He first deceas'd: She for a little tri'd To live without Him: lik'd it not, and di'd.
